price: 10. Kuwa kugula gala wacad (u hiillinta diinta) Waxay uun Wacad la sameyn Alle. Gacanta Ilaahay baa ka kor ah gacmahooda2. Ee qofkii ka baxaa wacadkiisa. wuxuu uun uga baxayaa naftii- sa, qofkii oofiyana wuxuu kula galay Alle ballanka, Wuxuu siin Ajar Weyn (Janno).
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ يُبَايِعُونَكَ إِنَّمَا يُبَايِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ يَدُ ٱللَّهِ فَوۡقَ أَيۡدِيهِمۡۚ فَمَن نَّكَثَ فَإِنَّمَا يَنكُثُ عَلَىٰ نَفۡسِهِۦۖ وَمَنۡ أَوۡفَىٰ بِمَا عَٰهَدَ عَلَيۡهُ ٱللَّهَ فَسَيُؤۡتِيهِ أَجۡرًا عَظِيمٗا
footnotes: 2. Macnaha waa inuu Allaah Subxaanahuu watacaalaa ka aqbalay wacadka ay galeen.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna yubāyiʿūnaka innamā yubāyiʿūna al-laha yadu al-lahi fawqa aydīhim faman nakatha fa-innamā yankuthu ʿalā nafsihi waman awfā bimā ʿāhada ʿalayhu al-laha fasayu'tīhi ajran ʿaẓīman
